info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 14 at 4:25AM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
info.description:
Tropical Storm Man-yi will be passing just north of Yap, Ulithi and Fais today. ASCAT shows that, as expected, the south side of the storm is weaker. Nevertheless, windy conditions with occasional gale force gusts can be expected across all 3 of these islands as Man-yi passes just to the north. Also, after Man-yi passes by, southeast winds flowing into Man-yi will keep the winds and gusts elevated to just below damaging levels Friday.
Locally heavy showers will also be moving through, widespread today, numerous tonight, diminishing to scattered on Friday. Gusts will be especially prevalent near these showers, which will help to mix down higher winds aloft. After Friday, conditions will start to normalize as Man-yi passes north of Palau. For today, tonight and Friday, take any necessary action to protect crops or other property vulnerable to high winds across these islands.

parameter.value: STRONG GUSTY WINDS ACROSS YAP...ULITHI AND FAIS THROUGH FRIDAY
